description: This file is a JavaScript module that implements a lightweight AI client for generating Statements of Work (SOW). It exports an asynchronous function `generateSOWFromPrompt` that attempts to generate a SOW based on a given prompt, first via a local backend endpoint and falling back to OpenAI's chat API if necessary.

methods.name: generateSOWFromPrompt(promptText)
methods.description: Asynchronously generates a SOW draft from a provided prompt. Prefers a local backend endpoint; if unavailable, it falls back to OpenAI's chat completion API. Handles errors and missing configurations gracefully.
